title: Bloomberg: Apple Pulls Taiwanese Flag Emoji

replies.msg:
Freedom of speech vs the Chinese market

As hard as it may be for companies to give up the Chinese market, universal values will slowly be eroded and become Chinese characteristics if governments, businesses and everyday consumers don’t stand against unjustified censoring of expressions because a country’s people can be unreasonably offended or for fear of sanctions from tyranny government

The least we can do, is to voice our support for reasoned expressions, and to voice our disgust towards such censorship
